rows.label: tev020901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Gina about the people of NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Gina about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Gina about her experiences with the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ask Gina for her thoughts on
the xenoforms living in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0001
rows.name:
I bet that when you BLADEs return to New LA after
a long deployment, you're sometimes confused by
all the changes that have occurred in the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0002
rows.name:
When that happens, you should just go for a walk and
listen to what people are talking about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0003
rows.name:
When something changes around here, the topics of
conversation around the city change, too. You might
overhear information that's important to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0004
rows.name:
And of course, if you don't overhear the information
you were looking for, it never hurts to ask directly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0005
rows.name:
Civilians are usually eager to help out a BLADE,
so you needn't be shy. Ask whatever you want![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0008
rows.name:
I met a guy the other day who was the biggest
boozehound I've ever seen.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0009
rows.name:
And believe me, I meet a lot of heavy drinkers in my
line of work. But never anyone like this before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0010
rows.name:
The friends he was drinking with got drunk one by
one, and by morning there was a pile of bodies
around his table.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0011
rows.name:
I was so taken aback by the pace of their drinking
that I never thought to ask his name.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0012
rows.name:
But I think he mentioned that he usually does his
drinking at the diner in the industrial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0013
rows.name:
He was a pretty interesting guy.
I hope he comes back to my place again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0021
rows.name:
We've had a lot of Ma-non customers coming in lately.
It's fun to have them aroundâ€”they're always so lively
and cheerful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0022
rows.name:
The other day, a bunch of them got drunk and started
dancing in a circle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0023
rows.name:
They even got some nearby BLADEs to join them.
It's like they were holding a little dance party![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0024
rows.name:
After all the casualties we've suffered in the fight with
the Ganglion, the mood around the city has darkened
considerably.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0025
rows.name:
But thanks to the Ma-non, our place is still full of
people laughing and having a good time.
Xenoforms like that are always welcome here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0041
rows.name:
We get a lot of xenoforms in my place, and they
all have such different lifestyles and perspectives
on the world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0042
rows.name:
And when all those different types assemble in one
spot, you never know what's gonna happen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0043
rows.name:
The Prone start fights, the Nopon start taking wagers
on the outcome...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0044
rows.name:
Meanwhile, the Orphe nibble on grass and chat
amongst themselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0045
rows.name:
I guess chaotic is the best word to describe it.
But I really love how exciting New LA has become![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Gina about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0046
rows.name:
When I saw Lyvia abruptly transform like that,
it blew me away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0047
rows.name: I was so stunned, I forgot all about my broken heart![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0048
rows.name:
And besides, there are plenty of other fish in the sea.
Although none are quite as handsome as him...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev020901_MSG0049
rows.name:
Er, but don't worry about me. I hope you two are very
happy together.[ST:wait ]
